tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dna_sequences_metadata (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  sequence_data TEXT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE metadata (
  metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_id INT NOT NULL,
  metadata_key VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metadata_value TEXT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id) REFERENCES dna_sequences(sequence_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sequence_metadata (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence_id UUID REFERENCES dna_sequences(id),
    region TEXT,
    gene_name TEXT,
    organism TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_sequence_id FOREIGN KEY(sequence_id) REFERENCES dna_sequences(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sequence_metadata (
  metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_id INT,
  metadata_key TEXT NOT NULL,
  metadata_value TEXT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id) REFERENCES dna_sequences(id)
);
